<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Initialize migration"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/migration/init/{migratorName}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Uploads a backup of a migrator specified in the request and initializes the import.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"migratorName","in":"path","description":"Migrator name","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"path":{"description":"Path to the backup file","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={undefined}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
